item.title: How to make new commands?
item.dc:creator: @Holy-Wings Holy-Wings
item.description:
@Holy-Wings wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:2, topic:229543”]ok u open up client.java and look for “starter” if nothing can be found look for “master” ok the commands look like these
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“place command name here”) && playerRights >= 0){ players rights… 0 nothing 1 mod 2 admin 3 owner

then u put somthing like… addItem(itemidhere, amounthere);
then keep doing that if u want more items put in ok if u want to to say a message u put this…

sendMessage(""+ playerName +" and the message goes here.");
when u r done with your commands u need to end with this } when u r done it should look like this

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“yellowphat”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(1040, 1);
sendMessage(""+ playerName +" u got a phat!!!");
}[/quote]
this is rsc u noob rofl

Read full topic
